code: function timeSince(timestamp){let time=Date.parse(timestamp);let now=Date.now();let secondsPast=(now-time)/1000;let suffix='ago';let intervals={year:31536000,month:2592000,week:604800,day:86400,hour:3600,minute:60,second:1};for(let i in intervals){let interval=intervals[i];if(secondsPast>=interval){let count=Math.floor(secondsPast/interval);return`${count} ${i}${count>1?"'s":''} ${suffix}`;}}}module.exports=timeSince;
